title: Resistance - R of wire with 2x area and 4x length

content.question: A wire is made of a material of resistivity <math alttext="rho" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>œÅ</mi></math>. The wire has resistance <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math>, uniform cross-sectional area <math alttext="a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>a</mi></math>, and length <math alttext="L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>L</mi></math>. What is the resistance of a wire made of the same material that has a uniform cross-sectional area of <math alttext="2 a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi></math> and a length of <math alttext="4 L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><mi>L</mi></math>?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
